title.text: RFC 4754: IKE and IKEv2 Authentication Using the Elliptic Curve Digital Signature Algorithm (ECDSA)

contents.text:
Network Working Group                                              D. Fu
Request for Comment: 4754                                     J. Solinas
Category: Standards Track                                            NSA
                                                            January 2007
IKE and IKEv2 Authentication Using the Elliptic Curve Digital Signature Algorithm (ECDSA)
contents.zh-CHS: 使用椭圆曲线数字签名算法（ECDSA）的IKE和IKEv2身份验证

contents.text: This document specifies an Internet standards track protocol for the Internet community, and requests discussion and suggestions for improvements. Please refer to the current edition of the "Internet Official Protocol Standards" (STD 1) for the standardization state and status of this protocol. Distribution of this memo is unlimited.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件规定了互联网社区的互联网标准跟踪协议，并要求进行讨论和提出改进建议。有关本协议的标准化状态和状态，请参考当前版本的“互联网官方协议标准”（STD 1）。本备忘录的分发不受限制。

contents.text: This document describes how the Elliptic Curve Digital Signature Algorithm (ECDSA) may be used as the authentication method within the Internet Key Exchange (IKE) and Internet Key Exchange version 2 (IKEv2) protocols. ECDSA may provide benefits including computational efficiency, small signature sizes, and minimal bandwidth compared to other available digital signature methods. This document adds ECDSA capability to IKE and IKEv2 without introducing any changes to existing IKE operation.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档描述了如何将椭圆曲线数字签名算法（ECDSA）用作Internet密钥交换（IKE）和Internet密钥交换版本2（IKEv2）协议中的身份验证方法。与其他可用的数字签名方法相比，ECDSA可以提供计算效率、较小的签名大小和最小的带宽等优点。本文档将ECDSA功能添加到IKE和IKEv2中，而不对现有IKE操作进行任何更改。

contents.text: The Internet Key Exchange, or IKE [IKE], is a key agreement and security negotiation protocol; it is used for key establishment in IPsec. In the initial set of exchanges, both parties must authenticate each other using a negotiated authentication method. In the original version of IKE, this occurs in Phase 1; in IKEv2, it occurs in the exchange called IKE-AUTH. One option for the authentication method is digital signatures using public key cryptography. Currently, there are two digital signature methods defined for use within Phase 1 and IKE-AUTH: RSA signatures and Digital Signature Algorithm (DSA) Digital Signature Standard (DSS) signatures. This document introduces ECDSA signatures as a third method.
contents.zh-CHS: 因特网密钥交换，或IKE[IKE]，是一种密钥协议和安全协商协议；它用于IPsec中的密钥建立。在交换的初始集合中，双方必须使用协商认证方法相互认证。在IKE的原始版本中，这发生在第1阶段；在IKEv2中，它发生在名为IKE-AUTH的交换中。身份验证方法的一个选项是使用公钥加密的数字签名。目前，在第一阶段和IKE-AUTH中定义了两种数字签名方法：RSA签名和数字签名算法（DSA）数字签名标准（DSS）签名。本文档介绍ECDSA签名作为第三种方法。

contents.text: For any given level of security against the best attacks known, ECDSA signatures are smaller than RSA signatures, and ECDSA keys require less bandwidth than DSA keys [LV]; there are also advantages of computational speed and efficiency in many settings. Additional efficiency may be gained by simultaneously using ECDSA for IKE/IKEv2 authentication and using elliptic curve groups for the IKE/IKEv2 key exchange. Implementers of IPsec and IKE/IKEv2 may therefore find it desirable to use ECDSA as the Phase 1/IKE-AUTH authentication method.
contents.zh-CHS: 对于针对已知攻击的任何给定安全级别，ECDSA签名都比RSA签名小，ECDSA密钥需要的带宽比DSA密钥[LV]少；在许多情况下，计算速度和效率也有优势。通过同时使用ECDSA进行IKE/IKEv2认证和使用椭圆曲线组进行IKE/IKEv2密钥交换，可以获得额外的效率。因此，IPsec和IKE/IKEv2的实现者可能会发现希望使用ECDSA作为阶段1/IKE-AUTH身份验证方法。

contents.text: The key word "SHALL" in this document is to be interpreted as described in [RFC2119].
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件中的关键词“应”应按照[RFC2119]中所述进行解释。

contents.text: The Elliptic Curve Digital Signature Algorithm (ECDSA) is the elliptic curve analogue of the DSA (DSS) signature method [DSS]. It is defined in the ANSI X9.62 standard [X9.62-2003]. Other compatible specifications include FIPS 186-2 [DSS], IEEE 1363 [IEEE-1363], IEEE 1363A [IEEE-1363A], and SEC1 [SEC].
contents.zh-CHS: 椭圆曲线数字签名算法（ECDSA）是DSA（DSS）签名方法[DSS]的椭圆曲线模拟。其定义见ANSI X9.62标准[X9.62-2003]。其他兼容规范包括FIPS 186-2[DSS]、IEEE 1363[IEEE-1363]、IEEE 1363A[IEEE-1363A]和SEC1[SEC]。

contents.text: ECDSA signatures are smaller than RSA signatures of similar cryptographic strength. ECDSA public keys (and certificates) are smaller than similar strength DSA keys, resulting in improved communications efficiency. Furthermore, on many platforms, ECDSA operations can be computed more quickly than similar strength RSA or DSA operations (see [LV] for a security analysis of key sizes across public key algorithms). These advantages of signature size, bandwidth, and computational efficiency may make ECDSA an attractive choice for many IKE and IKEv2 implementations.
contents.zh-CHS: ECDSA签名比具有类似加密强度的RSA签名小。ECDSA公钥（和证书）比强度相似的DSA密钥小，从而提高了通信效率。此外，在许多平台上，ECDSA操作的计算速度比类似强度的RSA或DSA操作更快（请参阅[LV]了解公钥算法密钥大小的安全性分析）。签名大小、带宽和计算效率的这些优势可能使ECDSA成为许多IKE和IKEv2实现的有吸引力的选择。

contents.text: 4. Specifying ECDSA within IKE and IKEv2

The original IKE key negotiation protocol consists of two phases, Phase 1 and Phase 2. Within Phase 1, the two negotiating parties authenticate each other using either pre-shared keys, digital signatures, or public key encryption.
contents.zh-CHS: 原始的IKE密钥协商协议包括两个阶段，第一阶段和第二阶段。在阶段1中，谈判双方使用预共享密钥、数字签名或公钥加密相互验证。

contents.text: The IKEv2 key negotiation protocol begins with two exchanges, IKE-SA-INIT and IKE-AUTH. When not using extensible authentication, the IKE-AUTH exchange includes a digital signature or Message Authentication Code (MAC) on a block of data.
contents.zh-CHS: IKEv2密钥协商协议从两个交换开始，IKE-SA-INIT和IKE-AUTH。当不使用可扩展身份验证时，IKE-AUTH交换在数据块上包含数字签名或消息身份验证码（MAC）。

contents.text: The IANA-assigned attribute number for authentication using generic ECDSA in IKE is 8 (see [IANA-IKE]), but the corresponding list of IKEv2 authentication methods does not include ECDSA (see [IANA-IKEv2]). Moreover, ECDSA cannot be specified for IKEv2 independently of an associated hash function since IKEv2 does not have a transform type for hash functions. For this reason, it is necessary to specify the hash function as part of the signature algorithm. Furthermore, the elliptic curve group must be specified since the choice of hash function depends on it as well. As a result, it is necessary to specify three signature algorithms, named ECDSA-256, ECDSA-384, and ECDSA-521. Each of these algorithms represents an instantiation of the ECDSA algorithm using a particular elliptic curve group and hash function. The three hash functions are specified in [SHS]. For reasons of consistency, this document defines the signatures for IKE in the same way.
contents.zh-CHS: IKE中使用通用ECDSA进行身份验证的IANA分配属性号为8（请参见[IANA-IKE]），但IKEv2身份验证方法的相应列表不包括ECDSA（请参见[IANA-IKEv2]）。此外，不能独立于相关联的哈希函数为IKEv2指定ECDSA，因为IKEv2没有哈希函数的转换类型。因此，有必要将哈希函数指定为签名算法的一部分。此外，必须指定椭圆曲线组，因为哈希函数的选择也取决于椭圆曲线组。因此，有必要指定三种签名算法，即ECDSA-256、ECDSA-384和ECDSA-521。这些算法中的每一个都表示使用特定椭圆曲线组和哈希函数的ECDSA算法的实例。三个哈希函数在[SHS]中指定。出于一致性的原因，本文档以相同的方式定义IKE的签名。

contents.text:
Digital
 Signature
 Algorithm            Elliptic Curve Group        Hash Function
-----------        --------------------------    ---------------
 ECDSA-256          256-bit random ECP group        SHA-256
 ECDSA-384          384-bit random ECP group        SHA-384
 ECDSA-521          521-bit random ECP group        SHA-512
The elliptic curve groups, including their base points, are specified in [IKE-ECP].
contents.zh-CHS: 椭圆曲线群，包括它们的基点，在[IKE-ECP]中规定。

contents.text: Since this document proposes new digital signatures for use within IKE and IKEv2, many of the security considerations contained within [IKE] and [IKEv2] apply here as well. Implementers should ensure that appropriate security measures are in place when they deploy ECDSA within IKE or IKEv2.
contents.zh-CHS: 由于本文件建议在IKE和IKEv2中使用新的数字签名，[IKE]和[IKEv2]中包含的许多安全注意事项也适用于此处。在IKE或IKEv2中部署ECDSA时，实现者应确保适当的安全措施到位。

contents.text: ECDSA-256, ECDSA-384, and ECDSA-521 are designed to offer security comparable with the AES-128, AES-192, and AES-256 respectively.
contents.zh-CHS: ECDSA-256、ECDSA-384和ECDSA-521的安全性设计分别与AES-128、AES-192和AES-256相当。

contents.text: IANA updated its registry of IPsec authentication methods in [IANA-IKE] and its registry of IKEv2 authentication methods in [IANA-IKEv2] to include ECDSA-256, ECDSA-384, and ECDSA-521.
contents.zh-CHS: IANA更新了[IANA-IKE]中的IPsec认证方法注册表和[IANA-IKEv2]中的IKEv2认证方法注册表，以包括ECDSA-256、ECDSA-384和ECDSA-521。

contents.text: When ECDSA-256, ECDSA-384, or ECDSA-521 is used as the digital signature in IKE or IKEv2, the signature payload SHALL contain an encoding of the computed signature consisting of the concatenation of a pair of integers r and s. The definitions of r and s are given in Section 8 of this document.
contents.zh-CHS: 当ECDSA-256、ECDSA-384或ECDSA-521用作IKE或IKEv2中的数字签名时，签名有效载荷应包含由一对整数r和s串联而成的计算签名的编码。本文件第8节给出了r和s的定义。

contents.text:
Digital
 Signature            Bit Lengths        Bit Length
 Algorithm            of r and s        of Signature
-----------          -------------     --------------
 ECDSA-256                256                512
 ECDSA-384                384                768
 ECDSA-521                528               1056
The bit lengths of r and s are enforced, if necessary, by pre-pending the value with zeros.
contents.zh-CHS: 如有必要，通过使用零预挂起值来强制执行r和s的位长度。

contents.text: The following are examples of the IKEv2 authentication payload for each of the three signatures specified in this document.
contents.zh-CHS: 以下是本文档中指定的三个签名的IKEv2身份验证有效负载示例。

contents.text:
The following notation is used.  The Diffie-Hellman group is given by
the elliptic curve y^2 = (x^3 - 3 x + b) modulo p.  If (x,y) is a
point on the curve (i.e., x and y satisfy the above equation), then
(x,y)^n denotes the scalar multiple of the point (x,y) by the integer
n; it is another point on the curve.  In the literature, the scalar
multiple is typically denoted n(x,y); the notation (x,y)^n is used to
conform to the notation used in [IKE], [IKEv2], and [IKE-ECP].

The group order for the curve group is denoted q.  The generator is
denoted g=(gx,gy).  The hash of the message is denoted h.  The
signer's static private key is denoted w; it is an integer between
zero and q.  The signer's static public key is g^w=(gwx,gwy).  The
ephemeral private key is denoted k; it is an integer between zero and
q.  The ephemeral public key is g^k=(gkx,gky).  The quantity kinv is
the integer between zero and q such that k*kinv = 1 modulo q.  The
first signature component is denoted r; it is equal to gkx reduced modulo q. The second signature component is denoted s; it is equal to (h+r*w)*kinv reduced modulo q.
contents.zh-CHS: 第一签名分量表示为r；它等于gkx约化模q。第二签名分量表示为s；它等于（h+r*w）*kinv约化模q。

contents.text: The test vectors below also include the data for verifying the ECDSA signature. The verifier computes h and the quantity sinv, which is the integer between zero and q such that s*sinv = 1 modulo q. The verifier computes
contents.zh-CHS: 下面的测试向量还包括用于验证ECDSA签名的数据。验证器计算h和数量sinv，该数量sinv是0和q之间的整数，使得s*sinv=1模q。验证器计算

contents.text: u = h*sinv modulo q and v = r*sinv modulo q.

The verifier computes (gx,gy)^u = (gux,guy) and (gwx,gwy)^v =
(gwvx,gwvy).  The verifier computes the sum
where + denotes addition of points on the elliptic curve. The signature is verified if
contents.zh-CHS: 其中+表示椭圆曲线上点的加法。签名在以下情况下进行验证：

The parameters for the group for this signature are
q: FFFFFFFF 00000000 FFFFFFFF FFFFFFFF BCE6FAAD A7179E84 F3B9CAC2 FC632551
The static and ephemeral keys are given by
The SHA-256 hash of the message "abc" (hex 616263) is

contents.text: The signature of the message is (r,s) where
The quantities required for verification of the signature are
contents.zh-CHS: 验证签名所需的数量如下：

contents.text: The signature is valid since sumx modulo q equals r.
contents.zh-CHS: 签名是有效的，因为sumx模q等于r。

contents.text: If the signature (r,s) were the one appearing in the authentication payload, then the payload would be as follows.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果签名（r，s）是出现在认证有效负载中的签名，那么有效负载将如下所示。

The parameters for the group for this signature are

contents.text:
[IANA-IKE]   Internet Assigned Numbers Authority, Internet Key
             Exchange (IKE) Attributes.
             (http://www.iana.org/assignments/ipsec-registry)
[IKE] Harkins, D. and D. Carrel, "The Internet Key Exchange (IKE)", RFC 2409, November 1998.
[IKEv2] Kaufman, C., "Internet Key Exchange (IKEv2) Protocol", RFC 4306, December 2005.
[IKE-ECP] Fu, D. and J. Solinas, "ECP Groups for IKE and IKEv2", RFC 4753, January 2007.
[RFC2119] Bradner, S., "Key words for use in RFCs to Indicate Requirement Levels", BCP 14, RFC 2119, March 1997.
contents.zh-CHS: [RFC2119]Bradner，S.，“RFC中用于表示需求水平的关键词”，BCP 14，RFC 2119，1997年3月。

contents.text: [SHS] FIPS 180-2, "Secure Hash Standard", National Institute of Standards and Technology, 2002.
contents.zh-CHS: [SHS]FIPS 180-2，“安全哈希标准”，国家标准与技术研究所，2002年。

contents.text: [X9.62-2005] American National Standards Institute, X9.62-2005: Public Key Cryptography for the Financial Services Industry: The Elliptic Curve Digital Signature Algorithm (ECDSA).
contents.zh-CHS: [X9.62-2005]美国国家标准协会，X9.62-2005：金融服务业的公钥加密：椭圆曲线数字签名算法（ECDSA）。

contents.text:
[DSS]        U.S. Department of Commerce/National Institute of
             Standards and Technology, Digital Signature Standard
             (DSS), FIPS PUB 186-2, January 2000.
             (http://csrc.nist.gov/publications/fips/index.html)

[IEEE-1363]  Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers. IEEE
             1363-2000, Standard for Public Key Cryptography.
             (http://grouper.ieee.org/groups/1363/index.html)

[IEEE-1363A] Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers. IEEE
             1363A-2004, Standard for Public Key Cryptography -
             Amendment 1: Additional Techniques.
             (http://grouper.ieee.org/groups/1363/index.html)

contents.text: The IETF invites any interested party to bring to its attention any copyrights, patents or patent applications, or other proprietary rights that may cover technology that may be required to implement this standard. Please address the information to the IETF at ietf-ipr@ietf.org.
